s.text: A bottle of Finish waits in the wings as chyron and narrator describe its "virtues."
The setting, however, strikes a coyly sultry note.
Not that The Cotton Club is in poor taste, you understand.

Leaves wither and fall as the plant continues to dance--the combination of potent chemicals and strip clubs isn't likely to endear itself to the PC police; and there are those who would be hard pressed to distinguish between Finish and Agent Orange.
